trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for user interface (UI) elements that use a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> to define their appearance.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate" /> 定義其外觀之使用者介面 (UI) 項目的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class is the base class for many of the controls you add to an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>類別是許多您應用程式中加入的控制項的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class defines very little behavior; while it is possible to add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> to your application, it is far more common to add a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>類別會定義很少的行為; 雖然您可以新增<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>您的應用程式通常會更加新增控制項是繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template%2A> property, which is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, specifies the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template%2A>屬性，這是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，指定的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the appearance of a control but retain its functionality, you should consider creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> instead of creating a new class.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更控制項的外觀，但保留其功能，您應該考慮建立新<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>而不是建立新的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a control with custom behavior as well as allow others to customize its appearance, your control can inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class and define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要建立控制項以自訂行為，以及讓其他人，自訂其外觀，您的控制項可以繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>類別，並定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to extend the behavior of an existing control, you can inherit from a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要擴充現有控制項的行為，您可以繼承自類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is not visible in your application, and setting the following properties has no effect unless the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> references them explicitly:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>沒有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>不是顯示在您的應用程式和設定下列屬性沒有任何作用，除非<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>明確參考它們：

trans-unit.source: A common way to use these properties is to bind an element in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to the property.
trans-unit.target: 一個常見的方式來使用這些屬性是繫結中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want your control to change color according to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property, you can bind some property of an element in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要變更色彩的值根據控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>屬性，您可以繫結中項目的某些屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md) to bind properties on a control to an element in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 使用[TemplateBinding 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)若要將屬性繫結控制項中的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> overrides the metadata of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property and sets its default to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> 覆寫的中繼資料<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>屬性，並設定其預設值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The computed size that is used to arrange the content.
trans-unit.target: 所計算出用來排列內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Called to arrange and size the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 物件內容，並調整大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default control arrangement arranges only the first visual child.
trans-unit.target: 預設控制項的排列方式排列只的第一個 visual 的子項。

trans-unit.source: No transforms are applied.
trans-unit.target: 未套用轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that describes the background of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述控制項背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to fill the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 用來填滿控制項背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property applies only to the resting state of a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>屬性只適用於休止控制項的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The default style of the control specifies its appearance when the state of the control changes.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的狀態變更時，控制項的預設樣式會指定它的外觀。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the button has that value only when it is not pressed or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，按鈕在未按下或停用時，才有值。

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a control that has a more advanced customization of the background, you must define the control's style.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要建立具有更進階的背景自訂控制項，您必須定義控制項的樣式。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的背景屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示範本，可讓觸發程序時按下變更按鈕的背景。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that describes the border background of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述控制項框線背景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to fill the control's border; the default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent" />.
trans-unit.target: 用來填滿控制項框線的筆刷，預設值是 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Transparent" />。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderBrush" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border thickness of a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的框線粗細。

trans-unit.source: A thickness value; the default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 粗細的值，預設值是四邊粗細為 0。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的框線寬度屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.BorderThickness" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font family of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的字型系列。

trans-unit.source: A font family.
trans-unit.target: 字型系列。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system dialog font.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是系統對話方塊字型。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the font family property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的字型家族的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontFamily" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字型大小。

trans-unit.source: The size of the text in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 中的文字大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" />。

trans-unit.source: The font size must be a positive number.
trans-unit.target: 字型大小必須為正數。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *double*
trans-unit.target: *double*

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
trans-unit.target: 字串表示法<xref:System.Double>值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值為`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions that are mentioned in the Property Value section apply here.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>屬性值 > 一節所述的範圍限制適用於此處。

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble*
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble*

trans-unit.source: A *double* value as previously described that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double*值如先前所述也就是後面接著一個這些單位宣告字串： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
trans-unit.target: `px` （預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]

trans-unit.source: `in` is inches; 1in==96px
trans-unit.target: `in` is inches; 1in==96px

trans-unit.source: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px
trans-unit.target: `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px

trans-unit.source: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px
trans-unit.target: `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px

trans-unit.source: **Note** In many cases a double may be set to "Auto," but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> does not render if set to "Auto".
trans-unit.target: **請注意**在許多情況下，double 值，可能會設定為 「 自動 」，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>不會呈現如果設定為 「 自動 」。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the font size property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的字型大小屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontSize" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the degree to which a font is condensed or expanded on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定螢幕上字型緊縮或加寬的程度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the font stretch property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的字型自動縮放的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For possible stretch values, see <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches>.
trans-unit.target: 如需可能的自動縮放值，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStretch" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字型樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStyles.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStyles.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the font style property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的字型樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontStyle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the weight or thickness of the specified font.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定字型的粗細。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontWeights.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontWeights.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined <xref:System.Windows.FontWeight> values, see the <xref:System.Windows.FontWeights> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得一份預先定義<xref:System.Windows.FontWeight>值，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.FontWeights>類別。

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight%2A>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.FontWeight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a brush that describes the foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述前景色彩的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The brush that paints the foreground of the control.
trans-unit.target: 繪製控制項前景的筆刷。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the system dialog font color.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為系統對話方塊字型的色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.SubPropertiesDoNotAffectRender%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the font style property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的字型樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示控制項是否支援捲動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" /> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若控制項在其樣式中具有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer" />，而且有自訂鍵盤捲動行為，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the control's content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項內容的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />。

trans-unit.source: In addition to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>, which stretches the child element to fill the allocated space of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Left>， <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Right>，和<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>，這會自動縮放以填滿配置的空間元素之父元素的子項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[對齊、 邊界和邊框距離概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the horizontal content alignment property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的內容的水平對齊屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.HorizontalContentAlignment" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is included in tab navigation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示控制項是否包含於索引標籤巡覽。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is included in tab navigation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項包含於索引標籤巡覽，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop%2A> is `false`, the control is excluded from tab navigation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop%2A>是`false`，控制項排除索引標籤瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop%2A> property and how to test whether a control is included in tab navigation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop%2A>屬性以及如何測試是否控制項包含在索引標籤瀏覽。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.IsTabStop" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the method can return.
trans-unit.target: 方法可以傳回的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Called to remeasure a control.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以重新測量控制項。

trans-unit.source: The size of the control, up to the maximum specified by <paramref name="constraint" />.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的大小，最多達到 <paramref name="constraint" /> 指定的上限。

trans-unit.source: The default control measurement only measures the first visual child.
trans-unit.target: 預設控制項度量只測量的第一個 visual 的子項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a mouse button is clicked two or more times.
trans-unit.target: 發生於按兩下或更多下滑鼠按鈕時。

trans-unit.source: Although this routed event seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然此路由的事件，看起來進行反昇路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發沿著項目樹狀結構的每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true` in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event handler, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> events along the route will occur with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件處理常式，後續<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>路由上的事件會發生與<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>設`false`。

trans-unit.source: This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application.
trans-unit.target: 這是較高層級的事件，控制項取用者想要在使用者按兩下控制項時收到通知，並處理應用程式中的事件。

trans-unit.source: Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event when <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is equal to two.
trans-unit.target: 應該使用控制項作者都想要處理滑鼠點按動作 double<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件時<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>等於兩個。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the state of <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致狀態<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>項目樹狀結構中的另一個項目會處理事件的案例中適當地傳播。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> events, but not corresponding single-click events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>類別會定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件，但沒有對應的按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> property value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已按一下控制項一次，請處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>事件 （或其對應項目），並檢查是否<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>屬性值為 1。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Direct
trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: Delegate - 委派

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何附加至事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>藉由呼叫事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: The control raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> event by calling the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>藉由呼叫事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RaiseEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnPreviewMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnPreviewMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnPreviewMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnPreviewMouseDoubleClick(System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The old template.
trans-unit.target: 舊的範本。

trans-unit.source: The new template.
trans-unit.target: 新的範本。

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the control's template changes.
trans-unit.target: 每當控制項的範本變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The timing for changing the template is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 變更範本的時間如下：

trans-unit.source: The template is changed by a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A> method call, a style trigger, or some other means.
trans-unit.target: 變更範本<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%2A>方法呼叫、 樣式的觸發程序或其他方式。

trans-unit.source: The property value changes; the property-changed callback is called.
trans-unit.target: 變更屬性值。屬性變更會呼叫回呼。

trans-unit.source: The old visual tree is removed.
trans-unit.target: 會移除舊的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: An internal method is called which eventually calls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnTemplateChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 內部的方法會呼叫最後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.OnTemplateChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Later, during a measure, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A> is called and a new visual tree is attached.
trans-unit.target: 更新期間，與量值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>呼叫，並會附加新的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the padding inside a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項內部的邊框間距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space between the content of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> and its <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 的內容及其 <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Border" /> 之間的間距數。

trans-unit.source: The default is a thickness of 0 on all four sides.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是四邊粗細為 0。

trans-unit.source: Padding is specified in the order Left, Top, Right, and Bottom.
trans-unit.target: 填補指定左順序、 頂端、 右側，和下方。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Thickness> and [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Thickness>和[對齊、 邊界和邊框距離概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the padding property of a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定控制項的邊框間距屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Padding" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user clicks the mouse button two or more times.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按滑鼠按鈕超過兩下時發生。

trans-unit.source: Although this routed event seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised along the element tree by each <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 雖然此路由的事件，看起來要遵循的通道路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發沿著項目樹狀結構的每個<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true` in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> event handler, subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> events along the route will occur with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> set to `false`, but the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event will occur with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性`true`中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>事件處理常式，後續<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>路由上的事件會發生與<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>設為`false`，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件就會發生與<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: This is a higher-level event for control consumers who want to be notified when the user double-clicks the control and to handle the event in an application.
trans-unit.target: 這是較高層級的事件，控制項取用者想要在使用者按兩下控制項時收到通知，並處理應用程式中的事件。

trans-unit.source: Control authors who want to handle mouse double clicks should use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event when <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> is equal to two.
trans-unit.target: 應該使用控制項作者都想要處理滑鼠點按動作 double<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件時<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>等於兩個。

trans-unit.source: This will cause the state of <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to propagate appropriately in the case where another element in the element tree handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致狀態<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>項目樹狀結構中的另一個項目會處理事件的案例中適當地傳播。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> class defines the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick> events, but not corresponding single-click events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>類別會定義<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件，但沒有對應的按一下事件。

trans-unit.source: To see if the user has clicked the control once, handle the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown> event (or one of its counterparts) and check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A> property value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者已按一下控制項一次，請處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown>事件 （或其對應項目），並檢查是否<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs.ClickCount%2A>屬性值為 1。

trans-unit.target: 直接

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將事件處理常式附加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Control.PreviewMouseDoubleClick" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the order in which elements receive focus when the user navigates through controls by using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，此值會決定當使用者使用 TAB 鍵巡覽控制項時，項目接收焦點的順序。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines the order of logical navigation for a device.
trans-unit.target: 決定裝置邏輯巡覽順序的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: A control with a lower tab index receives focus before a control with a higher index.
trans-unit.target: 具有較低的索引標籤索引控制項取得焦點的索引較高的控制項之前。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the tab index of three buttons.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定三個按鈕的定位點索引。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.TabIndex" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.TabIndex" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a control template.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: The template that defines the appearance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 外觀的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> specifies the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>; if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> will not appear in your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>指定外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>; 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>沒有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>不會出現在您的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The control author defines the default control template, and the application author can override the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to redefine the visual tree of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制作者定義的預設控制項範本，而且應用程式作者可以覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>重新定義控制項的視覺化樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: See [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md) for information and examples of how to change the visual tree of existing controls.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[控制項樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)資訊及如何變更現有控制項的視覺化樹狀結構的範例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is intended to be a self-contained unit of implementation detail that is invisible to outside users and objects, including <xref:System.Windows.Style> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>將不可見的外部使用者和物件，包括實作詳細資料的自主的單位<xref:System.Windows.Style>物件。

trans-unit.source: The only way to manipulate the content of the control template is from within the same control template.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的方式來操作控制項範本的內容會從位於相同的控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: If you add this to your application as a resource, all the buttons in the application will appear as ellipses but will still function as buttons.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的加入您為資源的應用程式，應用程式中的所有按鈕會顯示為省略符號，但仍會以按鈕的函式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Template" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Control" /> 物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項的字串。

trans-unit.source: Control authors should override this method to return a string that contains information that would be of interest to consumers of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項作者應該覆寫此方法以傳回字串，包含控制項的取用者相關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the control's content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項內容的垂直對齊。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: In addition to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>, and <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, which stretches the child element to fill the allocated layout space of the parent element.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Top>， <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Bottom>，和<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Center>，您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>，這會自動縮放以填滿父項目的配置空間的子項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Alignment, Margins, and Padding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[對齊、 邊界和邊框距離概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/alignment-margins-and-padding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property only affects a control whose template uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A> property as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性只會影響其範本使用的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment%2A>屬性做為參數。

trans-unit.source: On other controls, this property has no impact.
trans-unit.target: 其他控制項，此屬性沒有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the vertical content alignment property on a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何在控制項上設定內容的垂直對齊屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Control.VerticalContentAlignment" /> 相依性屬性。
